## @Eurotqg mailing list {#sec-eurotqg}

If you are willing to know about theoretical and quantitative geography related activities and the ECTQG in particular, don't hesitate to **subscribe to the [@Eurotqg mailing list](https://sympa.unil.ch/sympa/info/eurotqg)**

And/or please don't hesitate to get in touch with previous organisers, informal board members or send us an email to [info\@ectqg.org](mailto:info@ectqg.org)
